text: 2:4 Aisaia 30:18; Rom 3:25; Efesus 1:7; 2:9; 2 Pita 3:9; 3:15Manmaghɨn amizɨ God arazir aghuibar nɨ gamua, egha dughiar ruarimɨn nɨ mɨzua ikia, nɨn arazir kuram bagha ivezir kuram zuamɨra nɨ ganɨngizir puvatɨ. Godɨn arazir aghuarir kam, nɨ ti an garima a ti pura bizim? Nɨ uan navim giraghasa God ifuegha arazir aghuimɨn nɨ gami. Nɨ foz, o?
